Package com.company.hsm

Class HardwareSecurityModule

java.lang.Object
com.company.utility.CryptographyOperations
com.company.hsm.HardwareSecurityModule
public class HardwareSecurityModule extends CryptographyOperations

And hardware security module that can perform cryptographic operations an also create and verify trusts, and create and unwrap domains.

Functionalities:

  • Method Details

    • encryptWithDomain

      public byte[] encryptWithDomain(byte[] data, Domain domain)

    • decryptWithDomain

      public byte[] decryptWithDomain(byte[] encryptedData, Domain domain)

    • signTrust

      public boolean signTrust(Trust trust, List<OperatorSignature> operatorsSignaturesList)

      Sign a trust content.

      For this to be possible, the operators must also sign the trustContent, the hsm will verify these and also check if the hsm public key is in the trustContent so that it can sign it.

      Parameters:
      trust - the trustContent to sign
      operatorsSignaturesList - a list of TrustSignatures, these signatures have the operators signatures of the trustContent
      Returns:
      true if successful or false if not

    • signWithDomain

      public GeneralSignature signWithDomain(byte[] data, Domain domain)
      Sign data with a domain, verify the validity of the domain signature
      Parameters:
      data - the hash of data to sign in byte array format
      domain - the domain to unwrap and use key to sign domain
      Returns:
      the signature of the data as a GeneralSignature type or null if any signature fails

    • createTrust

      public Trust createTrust(List<PublicKey> hsmPublicKeysList, List<PublicKey> operatorPublicKeysList)
      Create a new trust. Special operation.
      Parameters:
      hsmPublicKeysList - the list of hsm public keys to add to trust.
      operatorPublicKeysList - the list of operator public keys to add to trust.
      Returns:
      a signed trust.

    • updateTrust

      public void updateTrust()

    • verifyTrustSignature

      public boolean verifyTrustSignature(Trust trust)
      Check if a trust is valid or not by verifying the signature.
      Parameters:
      trust - the trust to validate.
      Returns:
      true if signature is valid or false.

    • createDomain

      public Domain createDomain(Trust trust, HardwareSecurityModule.DOMAIN_KEYS_TYPE domainType, int domainId)
      Create domain using a valid trust
      Parameters:
      trust - a valid trust to be used to verify the domainKeys
      Returns:
      signed domain or null if trust is not valid

    • verifyDomainSignature

      public boolean verifyDomainSignature(Domain domain)
      Check signature of a domain, returns false if signature is not valid or given public key in signature is not in trust
      Parameters:
      domain - the domain to validate
      Returns:
      true if signature is valid or false if not
